rows.label: tev045701_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev045701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Paqu about Armory Alley.

rows.label: tev045701_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev045701_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Paqu if she's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev045701_SEL0023
rows.name: Ask Paqu about item rarity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0001
rows.name:
This is place where you sell things and get "money"
in return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0002
rows.name:
My mate has no interest in money.
So I try selling valuables to make ends meet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0003
rows.name:
Maybe I am doing it wrong? My beast bones are rare.
So rare. But no one will buy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0004
rows.name:
Prone have no concept of money. Only trade.
This place makes me uncomfortable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0005
rows.name:
Maybe I should grab nearest Nopon.
Force him to tell me secret of selling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0008
rows.name:
I heard L and Ma-non talk about their new shop.
They said something about "Trojan horse that will
overtake market."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0009
rows.name:
What is this...Trojan horse? Is it beast?
Does it taste as delicious as it sounds?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0010
rows.name:
Still, everything L carries is strange...
Maybe best not to get hopes up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0011
rows.name:
But allure of tasty new meat is strong...
So strong... Mmmrrrrfff...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0017
rows.name:
When BLADEs hunt beasts, they get materials.
Things like bones. Horns. Weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0018
rows.name:
But not all materials are same.
Some are rare and precious. Others are dull.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0019
rows.name:
Take weapons. Rarer weapon is, more likely it will have
special effect in combat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0020
rows.name:
I need rare weapon of my own.
Then I can beat my mate into doing work![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Paqu how you should use miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Paqu if she's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0021
rows.name:
Miranium is miracle mineral!
You can use it here at L's shop...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0022
rows.name:
You can give it to arms manufacturers to expand
business...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0023
rows.name:
You can even use it to make weapons or finish BLADE
jobs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0024
rows.name: Actually, miranium is lot like baaox.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0025
rows.name:
...You do not know baaox?
Versatile beast from Prone homeworld?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0026
rows.name:
Can be used as mount? Provides tasty meat?
Hard worker? Complete opposite of my mate?
*siiiiigh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0012
rows.name: L has opened shop here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0013
rows.name: Now many BLADEs come with weapons and armor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0014
rows.name:
...Oh, you did not know?
L made some kind of...device.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0015
rows.name:
Device can make any weapon stronger.
Even simple club made from beast bone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045701_MSG0016
rows.name:
I should have L add "slot" to my club.
Then I can beat sense into my useless mate![ST:wait ]
